mapper.select: select m.id, topic, begin_time, end_time, room_number, floor, building, meeting_status_id from participates p, meeting m, schedule s, meeting_room mr where user_id = #{userId} and p.meeting_id = m.id and m.id = s.meeting_id and s.meeting_room_id = mr.id
select m.id, topic, begin_time, end_time, room_number, floor, building, meeting_status_id from meeting m, schedule s, meeting_room mr where m.id = s.meeting_id and s.meeting_room_id = mr.id
